inclusion.criterion: HIV-positive at the time of enrollment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Initiating ART on day of enrollment, or already initiated on ART
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide written informed consent for study participation and data collection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to speak and understand spoken English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must possess a working cell phone during the enrollment visit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not previously enrolled in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient requests to be transfered to non-study site for HIV care and treatment on day of recruitment/enrollment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has cervical cancer, is HPV-positive, smokes heavily, and drinks alcohol frequently. She was offered a radical hysterectomy.
